note:
Cognitive neuroscientist studying visual attention and working memory using psychophysics, formal modelling and EEG. Currently a postdoctoral researcher in the Awh/Vogel Lab at the University of Chicago.

Advocate for science reform. Founded and organize the ReproducibiliTea journal club at the University of Chicago, and serve on the steering committee of the ReproducibiliTea global network.

Australian-born Malaysian-Chinese, first-generation college graduate. he/him
